original: 司馬昭部屬。曹髦率近衛攻打權臣司馬昭，成濟奉司馬昭、賈充之命殺害曹髦，之後被司馬昭以弒君之罪論處，夷三族。
text: Sima Zhao's subordinate. Cao Mao led his guards to attack the power official Sima Zhao. Chengji was ordered by Sima Zhao and Jia Chong to kill Cao Mao. Later, Sima Zhao was punished by Sima Zhao for the crime of killing the king.
